content: diamond daze hat materials size 7 circular needle &/or set of double point needles if decreasing is too difficult on circular needle stitch marker darning needle 100 gms of worsted weight yarn for main colour 25 gms of worsted weight yarn for contrasting colour gauge 12 sts x 12 row = 2 in stockinette adult small 19-20 is a finished hat of 16 inches adult medium 21- 22 is a finished hat of 18 inches adult large 23 24 is a finished hat of 20 inches please adjust your needle size to match gauge and remember to watch your second colour gauge to keep from pulling the hat in too tightly notes st/sts stitch/stitches mc main colour cc contrasting colour k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together pattern written for adult size s m l this can be adjusted by adding or reducing by a multiple of 6 sts directions ribbing cast on 80 92 104 sts in main colour join the stitches in the round being careful not to twist the stitches and place a stitch marker to mark the beginning of your round make your favorite ribbing for approximately 2 2 2½ inches i suggest k2 p2 but you can use what you like best after ribbing knit the next round and increase by 4 sts add a stitch after ¼ of the round 4 times for a total of 84 96 108 sts knit around in mc 1 more time then start the pattern both written and chart instructions are included copyright ©wickedgoodshari designs september 2020 -
